lines_and_colors: Would you like Summer? Taste of our's -
Ill! We have Berries, for the parching!
Perplexed! Estates of Violet - Trouble ne'er looked on!
Captive! We bring Reprieve of Roses!
Even for Death - A Fairy medicine -
document.title: Would you like summer? Taste of our's
document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
